history.proof: intros a b d H. induction H. - srun best use: unicity_is_gcdZ, gcd_OZ, gcdZ_correct. - srun best use: gcdZ_correct, gcd_mod, unicity_is_gcdZ unfold: is_diveuclZ.

exceptions.exn: In environment b : Z Unable to unify "gcdZ OZ b" with "absZ b".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
No such bound variable b (possible names are: P, z, z0 and z1).

original: intros a b d H. induction H. - reflexivity. - apply is_gcdZ_sind with (b:=b) (a:=a) (d:=d) (q:=q) (r:=r) in IHis_gcdZ. apply IHis_gcdZ.
